results.content:
This course has offered a quick and well-rounded tour through essential Bootstrap features. For beginners of Bootstrap, this helps a lot in building up a mind map of what's available in Bootstrap.

The course has also left some room for improvement. First, it needs update because it is about Bootstrap 3 (though not too different from Bootstrap 4). Second, the code editor should've had a dark background to make the view more visually comfortable (the white background is glaring!).

By the way, the instructor's got a charming, well-enunciated voice to listen to, which is an unexpected highlight to me.
results.content_html:
This course has offered a quick and well-rounded tour through essential Bootstrap features. For beginners of Bootstrap, this helps a lot in building up a mind map of what's available in Bootstrap.

The course has also left some room for improvement. First, it needs update because it is about Bootstrap 3 (though not too different from Bootstrap 4). Second, the code editor should've had a dark background to make the view more visually comfortable (the white background is glaring!).

By the way, the instructor's got a charming, well-enunciated voice to listen to, which is an unexpected highlight to me.

However instructor has gone through pretty much all topics laid down in Bootstrap docs. ...overall ok experience

results.content:
Has useful content, but is out of date as Bootstrap 4 has been out for a few years now. Given this, I did use the course as a basis and update for v4, but there are a number of items which have been completely deprecated, such as wells and panels.
Also, as mentioned in the Q&A, there is a missing grid system diagram which would have been very useful.
results.content_html:
Has useful content, but is out of date as Bootstrap 4 has been out for a few years now. Given this, I did use the course as a basis and update for v4, but there are a number of items which have been completely deprecated, such as wells and panels.
Also, as mentioned in the Q&A, there is a missing grid system diagram which would have been very useful.

results.content: The audio volume is inconsistent between lessons.  All lessons appear to be a single take with no script, which results in a disorganized feeling.  Some slides have typos and missing images.  Finally, there was no real way to follow along, most of the videos use examples that are already written, which the instructor then explains.  For me personally, it wasn’t an effective method of teaching the material.
results.content_html: The audio volume is inconsistent between lessons. All lessons appear to be a single take with no script, which results in a disorganized feeling. Some slides have typos and missing images. Finally, there was no real way to follow along, most of the videos use examples that are already written, which the instructor then explains. For me personally, it wasn’t an effective method of teaching the material.
